Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Br-AFP1 (natural AMPs; defensins; plants; XXQ, UCSS1a;  4S=S)

Literature.Author: Terras FR, Torrekens S, Van Leuven F, Osborn RW, Vanderleyden J, Cammue BP, Broekaert WF.1993
Literature.Title: A new family of basic cysteine-rich plant antifungal proteins from Brassicaceae species

Sequence Information.Target Organism: low salt medium A: active against A. brassicola (IC50 3 ug/ml), B. cinerea (IC50 1.5 ug/ml), F. culmorum (IC50 2 ug/ml), F. oxysporum f.sp. lycopersici (IC50 1.8 ug/ml), P. oryzae (IC50 0.25 ug/ml), and V. dahliae (IC50 0.8 ug/ml).
